Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc12
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.View.Client.TUI.TUIViews

Class TUILobbiesView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.View.Client.View
it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.View.Client.TUI.TUIViews.TUIView
it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.View.Client.TUI.TUIViews.TUILobbiesView
public class TUILobbiesView extends TUIView
Singleton class representing the lobbies view in the Terminal User Interface (TUI). It extends the TUIView class and implements methods for displaying and interacting with the lobbies.

  • Field Summary
